query: Tell me 3 companies interested in Sales Marker in recent 1 week

results.title: MCP Conversation Result
results.snippet: I'm sorry, but the provided data context doesn't contain any information about companies interested in the Sales Marker in the recent week. It appears there was an error with the request parameters, resulting in no usable data in the message. Unfortunately, without appropriate data, I'm unable to provide the specific companies you're interested in.
